<<<<<<< HEAD
His Majesties letter to the artillery company: with an account of their proceedings at the choice of several officers for the ensuing year, on Wednesday, the 9th. of this instant, February, 1680/1. England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II) Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
1 sheet ([2] p.).
Printed for V.T., London : 1681.
Actually an account of the meeting of the artillery company which includes a brief letter from the King on verso. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======

1 sheet ([2] p.).
Printed for V.T., London : 1681.
Actually an account of the meeting of the artillery company which includes a brief letter from the King on verso. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
